alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:56AM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hudspeth County through 630 AM MDT... At 555 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Frenchman Canyon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Hudspeth County. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 109 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
